# f5xc_trusted_ca_list (Resource)

Shape of the Root CA Certificate specification

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_trusted_ca_list" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the TrustedCaList. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the TrustedCaList will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.
- `trusted_ca_url` (String) Root CA Certificate. Trusted CA certificates for validating certificates ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 512000 ves.io.schema.rules.string.truststore_url: true

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_trusted_ca_list.example system/example
```
